about_the_game:
Pair up all animals with one of their own type to beat each puzzle level
Explore how different animal types, objects, and tiles interact with one another and
Utilize their unique traits to find the optimal solution and earn all 3 stars!
Make and share your own puzzles using Zoolovelogy's handy in-game editor

Features:
Easy to grasp but deep gameplay with many different interactions
Hundreds of levels (100+ on release)
Lots of different animal types, each with their own unique attributes (with more to come!)
Various tiles and objects that differentiate the gameplay
Puzzle editor so that players can create their own custom levels & share them with others

name: Zoolovelogy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1.60 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Pair up all animals with one of their own type to beat each puzzle level. Explore and utilize the unique traits of each animal type, tile, and object to find the optimal solution and earn all 3 stars! Make and share your own puzzles using the handy in-game editor.
